Brands your Android project. You get a ready project, but you need to build and publish the app manually in Google Play.
Builds the project and saves an assembled *.apk Android app file to the utility directory.
html:
tasks parameter value

Result of the SDKConsole utility execution

prepare

Brands your Android project. You get a ready project, but you need to build and publish the app manually in Google Play.

build

Builds the project and saves an assembled *.apk Android app file to the utility directory.
